Čeština: Increases and randomises citizen life span, randomises the ages and education levels of immigrants, and changes how citizens travel to and from work
Changing settings during a game can temporarily disrupt city balance.
Saving a backup before changing is HIGHLY recommended.
Mod legacy lifespans (original WG mod) - shorter lifespans, fewer seniors
Vanilla Sunset Harbor lifespans - less variable lifespans, slightly more seniors
(only when using mod's Sunset Harbor lifespans)
Decreasing retirement age won't change the status of citizens who have already retired under previous settings.
Increasing retirement age won't change the appearance of citzens who have already retired under previous settings.
Age in years at which children start school
Age in years at which children start high school
Age in years at which children start college/university
Random illness % chance per decade of life
Does not affect sickness from specific causes, e.g. pollution or noise
% of dead bodies requiring deathcare transportation
Apply 25% variation to immigrant education levels
Log custom transport choices to 'Lifecycle transport log.txt' WARNING - SLOW!
Log sickness events to 'Lifecycle sickness log.txt'
Factor to slow down how fast citizens age, compared to base game.

1 is base game speed (35 in-game weeks is equal to 10 years of age), 2 is twice as slow (70 in-game weeks for 10 years of age), 3 is three times as slow, etc. A multiplier of 15 means that citizens will age approximately one year for each in-game year.
Does not affect lifecycles or ages - only the speed at which citizens age relative to game speed.
Lifecycle Rebalance Revisited has been updated to version 1.5
Transport mode choices can now be edited via the options panel, and eco and ordinary residential can have different mode choices
Education levels of people moving into your city can be modified
Adjust options panel layout for translations
Single parents with underage children living at home will be spared from early death, to help prevent orphan households
Improved mod conflict checking and notification
Change treatment of single parent death: remove orphaned children when both parents die (instead of sparing parent from death)
Add code to check for and remove building residents with invalid data
MAJOR NEW FEATURE: realistic early life ageing and progress, from early childhood to young adult (optional, customizable)
New early life ageing is matched to real-world values and stages and includes a pre-school stage of life (young children)
This option can be enabled/disabled and customized in the mod's options panel
NOTE: this option is initially enabled by default
